definitions.definition: The process or art of finding candidates for a post in an organization , or recruits for the armed forces .
A style or process of recruiting .
The addition of new adult or breeding-age individuals ( recruits ) to a population.
The full aeration of a lung .
Opening of collapsed lung alveoli by means of controlled increase in transpulmonary pressure using mechanical ventilation. ( treatment strategy for ARDS )
A physical condition of the inner ear that leads to reduced tolerance of loudness , commonly occurring in those with hearing loss due to cochlear damage .

main_definition: The process or art of finding candidates for a post in an organization , or recruits for the armed forces .
secondary_definitions: A style or process of recruiting .
( biology , ecology ) The addition of new adult or breeding-age individuals ( recruits ) to a population.
( physiology ) The full aeration of a lung .
( medicine ) Opening of collapsed lung alveoli by means of controlled increase in transpulmonary pressure using mechanical ventilation. ( treatment strategy for ARDS )
( medicine ) A physical condition of the inner ear that leads to reduced tolerance of loudness , commonly occurring in those with hearing loss due to cochlear damage .
